Params: {2: 'Browning', 3: 'There was a landmine—b-below the device... I protected it—when it exploded...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I can reattach your leg with the right parts!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The energy capsules at the back are broken. It must be the explosion...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Browning', 3: "N-no—without enough energy... the device won't last—e-even if it starts...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Browning', 3: "There's a way... Configure the energy arrangement, then it can be attached to your power source.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Do I just need to reconfigure the arrangement? I'll fix it this time!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Browning', 3: "Pass me your weapon clearance—I-I'll protect you... while you reconfigure it...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Alright! I'll pass you the firing command as well, or else you won't be able to open fire!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'When I reconfigure the arrangement, my frame will temporarily enter emergency safe mode.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'You must be careful if you encounter anything dangerous!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'll be back as soon as possible!", 4: '1'}
